name: Ganesh Chaturthi
description: A grand festival celebrating the birth of Lord Ganesha, marked by elaborate processions and rituals.

name: Gudi Padwa
description: The Marathi New Year festival, celebrated with traditional rituals and festive foods.

name: Nag Panchami
description: A festival dedicated to the worship of snakes, observed with offerings and prayers.

name: Holi
description: The festival of colors, celebrated with joy and vibrant colors.

name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Jayanti
description: A grand celebration of the birth anniversary of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj, the revered Maratha king. The festival is marked by processions, cultural programs, and speeches honoring his legacy.
